items.title: Azure Functions vs Azure Logic apps

outboundReferences.contextLine: Both [[azure-functions]] and [[azure-logic-apps]] are Azure Services that enable serverless workloads.
Both can create complex **orchestrations**. For Azure Functions you develop orchestrations by writing code that use the [[azure-durable-functions]] extension.

fields.title: AZ-204 - Developing Solutions for Microsoft Azure
Azure Functions vs Azure Logic apps
